评论概述: Good quality backpack and super cute!
评论详情: I bought this backpack several months ago and have used it quite a bit when riding my motorcycle or to all day events that I don't want to carry a purse around. The backpack seems to be very well made, zippers are smooth, and straps are easy to adjust. It also has several small zipper compartments, including a couple on the back that you can tuck away small items such as extra cash, credit cards, etc. The leopard pattern is super cute and doesn't look cheaply designed either. Highly recommend!
I absolutely love this bag. I can get all my stuff for work in it. It's not super stiff it's kind of a softer "leather".
